title: Ssd
message: any way to fix the ssd's that are not mouting?  have a few including a 1tb one that randomly stopped working.

title: Ssd
message: Not mounting or just totally not showing up? Try in external caddy, but usually these are trash.

title: Ssd
message: I have some not showing up, others fail when trying to partition/reformat in windows or mac.  I have the OWC caddies which are pretty good, but doesn't really help.

title: Ssd
message: Hopeless cases, I have never fixed one. They either go in read-only mode or just totally die. This is a NAND or firmware issue.

title: Ssd
message: no worries, just was curious if they were worth keeping around.  have a stack of them

title: Ssd
message: A good supply of crap to stick in assholes that don't pay machines.
